p: Any additional items identified during the eligibility process through references to reviewed items that met the eligibility criteria (n = 7) were then added to those to be included in the review. A thematic review was conducted on the final combination of items identified from databases (n = 11), Google search output (n = 19) and newly identified items (n = 7). Figure 1 shows a flow chart outlining the selection process for this systematic review. The items selected for review consisted of peer-reviewed articles and various other papers and reports ( Table 1).
